root.title: ford motor credit f redeem debentur
root.body: ford motor co sai ford motor credit co april on will redeem 4.0 mln dlr 8.70 pct debentur due april 1 1999 sai debentur redeem price 100 pct princip april 1 1987 interest payment date debentur accru interest will payabl redempt date part redempt proce debentur will select redempt pro rata basi ford sai
